snippet: Scientists report a remarkably quick response to natural selection in an isolated population of French-Canadian women on the Île des Coudres in the St. Lawrence River.
lead_paragraph: Scientists report a remarkably quick response to natural selection in an isolated population of French-Canadian women on the Île des Coudres in the St. Lawrence River.

headline.main: Natural Selection Leaves Fresh Footprints on a Canadian Island
headline.print_headline: Natural Selection Leaves Fresh Footprints on a Canadian Island
headline.seo: Natural Selection Leaves Fresh Footprints on Canadian Island
